name: Shackles (DocShaq)
description: When one thinks of shackles, they often associate them being placed on a prison. Imagine a scenario where the roles are reversed. In Shackles you play as "The Warden" who must escape a prison overrun with inmates. Most of the inmates have already fled by the time you awake at your desk however, there are those who have decided to stay. As, all they crave is chaos and have put a bounty on your head.
